text: Fort Lauderdale is a city in the state of Florida in the United States. It is 23 miles (37 km) north of Miami. As of 2020, the city of Fort Lauderdale had a population of 182,760. The city is a popular tourist destination. It had 10.35 million visitors in 2006. ==Climate== Despite not being below the Tropic of Cancer, Fort Lauderdale has a Tropical Rainforest (Af) Climate with a long hot year with no true dry season. ==References== Category:County seats in Florida
title: Fort Lauderdale, Florida
